mapper.select: SELECT A.USERNO ,A.USERNAME ,A.USERID ,A.EMAIL ,A.USERDUTY ,(SELECT ROLENAME FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.T_ROLE WHERE A.CHKROLE = ROLENO) AS CHKROLE_ ,CHKROLE ,CASE WHEN A.ISDELETE = 0 THEN '사용' WHEN A.ISDELETE = 1 THEN '미사용' END AS ISDELETE_ ,ISDELETE ,CASE WHEN A.CHKAUTH = 10 THEN '일반사용자' WHEN A.CHKAUTH = 20 THEN '관리자사용자' END AS CHKAUTH_ ,CHKAUTH ,CONVERT(nvarchar,A.ENTERDATE,23) AS ENTERDATE ,A.MOBILE1 ,A.MOBILE2 ,A.MOBILE3 ,A.TELNO1 ,A.TELNO2 ,A.TELNO3 ,A.USERDESC FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.TB980010 A WHERE SITEID = #{siteid} AND USERNO = #{userno}
mapper.update: UPDATE Crud_SaaS.dbo.TB980010 SET ISDELETE = '1' WHERE USERNO = #{userno}
mapper.select: SELECT TOP 5 A.USERNO ,A.USERNAME ,A.USERID ,A.EMAIL ,A.USERDUTY ,(SELECT ROLENAME FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.T_ROLE WHERE A.CHKROLE = ROLENO) AS CHKROLE_ ,CASE WHEN A.ISDELETE = 0 THEN '사용' WHEN A.ISDELETE = 1 THEN '미사용' END AS ISDELETE_ ,CONVERT(nvarchar,A.REGDATE,23) AS REGDATE ,A.EMAIL ,A.MOBILE1 ,A.MOBILE2 ,A.MOBILE3 FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.TB980010 A WHERE A.ISDELETE = 0 AND A.SITEID = #{siteid}
